items.sentence: I wonder whether or not Tom will come tonight.
We\'ll let Mary prepare dinner for us tonight.
Tom came down to breakfast earlier than usual.
Tom came in and sat down on one of the chairs.
Tom carried the dirty dishes into the kitchen.
The baby was taken care of by its grandmother.
Tom wasn\'t able to explain what had happened.
I want you to go and see if it\'s still there.
I want you to know I can\'t be there tomorrow.
I want you to know that I\'ll always love you.
